rules_text:
Panya can’t be blocked by creatures with power 3 or greater.
At the beginning of each end step, if you cast an instant or sorcery spell this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Panya.
rules_text2: Exile the top three cards of your library. For as long as they are exiled, whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may put one into your hand.
